name: http-hello-world-wasm
description: Simple codebase for reversing a string via WebAssembly with jco

scripts.build:component: jco componentize http-hello-world.js --wit wit/ --world-name component --out http-hello-world.wasm
scripts.build: jco componentize http-hello-world.js --wit wit/ --world-name component --out http-hello-world.wasm
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run demo
